import React from 'react'; import MissionVision from '../components/MissionVision'; const About = () => { return (
{/* Hero */}

About Us

Reshow Investments (Pvt) Ltd is a well-established corporate branding and promotional gifting company serving corporates, NGOs, public institutions, and private organisations across Zimbabwe.

Our business was founded on the vision of delivering quality, value-driven, flexible, and timely branding solutions tailored to real-time customer needs.

{ e.target.src = '/images/placeholder.jpg'; }} />
{/* Mission & Vision */} {/* Values */}

Our Values

{[ { title: 'Efficiency', desc: 'Timely turnaround without compromising quality' }, { title: 'Integrity', desc: 'Transparent operations and honest engagement' }, { title: 'Flexibility', desc: 'Tailored solutions that adapt to client needs' }, { title: 'Responsiveness', desc: 'Proactive support and real-time communication' }, { title: 'Customer Satisfaction', desc: 'Commitment to exceeding expectations' }, ].map((value, index) => (

{value.title}

{value.desc}

))}
{/* Partnership */}

Strategic Partnerships

BARRON South Africa

Reshow Investments is proud to be the exclusive Zimbabwean distributor of BARRON South Africa, a leader in promotional apparel and corporate gifting.

This partnership gives our clients access to a world-class catalogue of premium workwear, uniforms, executive gifts, and branding materials, backed by international quality standards.

{/* Experience */}

Our Experience

With over 10 years of experience, we serve clients across:
